channel.title: Problem Help Me Out
channel.description:
Well i have a server built off of testscape right.......Soul VX PK 5.147.135.145 ham: Soul VX PK pass 123 The problem is is i can't get the hp to go up when i eat It's max is 200/99 but when u put on armor after u do it u drop hp when hit Then when u eat it takes ure hp to a sertain level below 100 and if u eat again it wont raise Help me plz
TY
~Owner Soulx~[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 08:54:04 PM[/size][hr]help

item.title: Problem Help Me Out

item.description:
@_Owner_Soulx wrote:

Well i have a server built off of testscape right…Soul VX PK 5.147.135.145
ham: Soul VX PK pass 123
The problem is is i can’t get the hp to go up when i eat
It’s max is 200/99 but when u put on armor after u do it u drop hp when hit
Then when u eat it takes ure hp to a sertain level below 100 and if u eat again it wont raise
Help me plz

TY
